item.title: Macy Gray - Sweet Baby
item.description:
Many times
I’ve been told that
I should go
but they don’t know
What we got baby
they may not see
The love in you
but love I do
And I’ll stay
right here em
Sweet sweet baby
life is crazy
But there’s one thing
I am sure of
That I’m your lady
always baby
And I’ll love you
now and ever
Sugar wishes
don’t change
What is real
or how it feels
In the bad times
for whatever he is
He is mine
all the time
And we’ll get by
with our true love
Em sweet sweet baby
life is crazy
But there’s one thing
I am sure of
That I’m your lady
always baby
And I love you
now and ever
Em em sweet baby
life is crazy
But there’s one thing
I am sure of that
I’m your lady
always baby
And I love you
now and ever
Who’d of ever thought
just the two of us
That we’d come
this far together baby
So I’m here to stay
cause without you
Baby I can’t go
any further-
Em em sweet baby
life is crazy
But there’s one thing
I am sure of that
I’m your lady
always baby baby
Na na ever
na na ever
Na ah ever
my sweet sweet baby-

item.title: Macy Gray - When I See You
item.description:
It’s been three days
since I screamed
And hung up on ya
all I wanted
Was to hold you
tight
I’m sorry baby never
meant to be
mean to ya
and I hope
You’re coming back
tonight
You’re heasitating
cos you don’t love
Affair
I promise baby
It’ll be alright
truth is all
I’m doing
is missing ya

when I see ya
I’m wanna love you
all over the place

all over your face

yeah yeah

cos I don’t wanna
